column1: Art Institute of Chicago////What I really like about this place is that they also give you a 1-hour map to hit up some of the famous exhibits
column5: and etc. My absolute favorite was the miniature room display. I could have spent an entire day
column6: mesmerized by the intricate designs of each furniture piece
column7: background art and mini-tapestries. I'd get the Citypass
column8: since it comes with the audio tour.
